short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Collect, curate and share the best of the web.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Listory is a place to where you can collect and curate into lists the things you are passionate about. These can be articles, videos, book reviews, podcasts, and essentially anything that has a URL. 

You can keep your lists to yourself, or share them with others. When you do share them, just imagine how delightful of an experience youâ€™re creating for someone with similar interests!

We are still early on in our journey, and would love to get your feedback so we can improve Listory and make it the perfect place for content curation. Feel free to drop us a line at hello@listory.com, or join our community at listory.useresponse.com.

The Listory team.
